main event: An observer reported seeing the lights of a small plane climbing further up into the clouds in Columbus, Ohio on August 10, 1959.
interesting points: The observer stated that the lights appeared to be climbing and were lost in clouds., The sighting lasted approximately 30 seconds., The object was described as reddish in color and comparable in size to a small, private plane., The report indicated varied conclusions including possibilities of different objects such as a balloon or aircraft., The case was ultimately closed due to insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: one reddish light, resembling a small plane
